mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MOIM_COMMENT VALUES(MMSQ.NEXTVAL,#{mmContent},SYSDATE, MMGROUPSQ.NEXTVAL, 1, NULL, #{userId},#{moimNo})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MOIM_COMMENT WHERE MOIM_NO=#{moimNo} ORDER BY GROUP_NO, GROUP_SQ
mapper.update: UPDATE MOIM_COMMENT SET MM_CONTENT=#{mmContent} WHERE MOIM_NO=#{moimNo} AND MM_NO=#{mmNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MOIM_COMMENT WHERE MOIM_NO=#{moimNo} AND MM_NO=#{mmNo}
mapper.select: SELECT GROUP_SQ FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, TEMP.* FROM (SELECT * FROM MOIM_COMMENT WHERE MOIM_NO=#{moimNo} AND GROUP_NO=#{parentgroupNo} ORDER BY GROUP_SQ DESC)TEMP) WHERE RN=1

SELECT MOIM_NO,COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM MOIM_COMMENT WHERE MOIM_NO IN (SELECT MOIM_NO FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN,TEMP.* FROM (SELECT MOIM_BOARD.* FROM MOIM_BOARD) TEMP) WHERE (RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow})) GROUP BY MOIM_NO ORDER BY MOIM_NO DESC
